description: SPM4Sigma(n) = (-1)^(1/2*((Sum_i p_i)-Omega(m'))*Sum_{d|n} (-1)^(1/2*((Sum_j p_j)-Omega(d'))*d =(2^(r+1)-1)*Product_i [Sum_{1<=s_i<=r_i} p_i^s_i +(-1)^((p_i-1)/2)] where n=2^r*m', gcd(2,m')=1, m'=Product_i p_i^r_i, d=2^k*d', gcd(2,d')=1, d'=Product_j p_j^r_j SPM4 for Signed by Prime factors Mod 4.
